definition: very different from each other and of various kinds

the name used for some books of the Old Testament and the Hebrew Bible

making you feel dizzy; making you feel that a situation is changing very fast

relating to a doctrine or doctrines
showing determination; not giving up easily

a very long time; forever

extreme in a way that has a sudden, serious or violent effect on something

that you cannot be sure about; that is probably not good

doing everything that you are expected to do; willing to obey and to show respect
